en-us.RelatedDataMethodsInfo1: You can click the button to bind the data method
en-us.CopyrightAndDisclaimerInfo: All copyrights of a material (model, data, article, etc.) in the OpenGMS fully belong to its author/developer/designer (or any other wording about the owner). The OpenGMS takes every care to avoid copyright infringement, contributor(s) should carefully employ materials from other sources and give proper citations.
en-us.ContributorInfo: Contributor is the person who contributes the item to OpenGMS, may not be the author of the item.
en-us.PermanentlyDelete: This will permanently delete the comment. Continue?

zh-cn.RelatedDataMethodsInfo1: 你可以点击按钮绑定数据方法
zh-cn.CopyrightAndDisclaimerInfo: OpenGMS中的资源(模型、数据、文章等)的所有版权完全属于其作者/开发人员/设计者(或关于所有者的任何其他说法)。 OpenGMS会尽一切努力避免版权侵犯问题，贡献者应谨慎使用其他来源的资源，并给予适当的引用。
zh-cn.ContributorInfo: 贡献者是将资源提交给OpenGMS的人，可能并不是该资源的所有者。
zh-cn.PermanentlyDelete: 这将会永久删除评论，是否继续？
